channel.title: Banking problems

item.title: Banking problems
item.dc:creator: @huggies huggies
item.description:
@huggies wrote:

[quote=“delta, post:2, topic:170737”]} else if (NPCID == 494 || NPCID == 495 || NPCID == 2619) { /Banking/
openUpbank();[/quote]

			[code]} else if (NPCID == 494 || NPCID == 495 || NPCID == 2619) { /*Banking*/
				openUpbank();
				skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX;
				skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY;
				NpcWanneTalk = 1;[/code]

Gives errors

EDIT: Problem solved, searched and found it should be openUpBank and not openUpbank.

Thanks a lot Delta!

EDIT: Yarr just notice it didn’t work. When I try it just sends me an message…

Read full topic

item.title: Banking problems
item.dc:creator: @huggies huggies
item.description:
@huggies wrote:

Ok I’m trying to get a few NPCs to open bank when you talk to them. But I can’t get it working… Help would be appreciated.

NPC ID(s) = 2619, 494.

Here’s my code;

else if (NPCID == 2619) { skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX; skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY; NpcWanneTalk = 1; }

Still nothing happend either with left- or right click. Also I found this;

} else if (NPCID == 494 || NPCID == 495 || NPCID == 2619) { /*Banking*/ skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX; skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY; NpcWanneTalk = 1;

No errors when compiling.

Read full topic
